Type Property# scrollToVisibleAction

macOS 26.0+

```
static let scrollToVisibleAction: NSAccessibility.Action
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-swift.struct/Action/scrollToVisibleAction#see-also)

### [Actions](/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-swift.struct/Action/scrollToVisibleAction#Actions)

[`static let cancel: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/cancel)An action that cancels the operation.[`static let confirm: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/confirm)An action that simulates pressing Return in the object, such as a text field.Deprecated[`static let decrement: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/decrement)An action that decrements the value of the object.[`static let delete: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/delete)An action that deletes the value of the object.[`static let increment: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/increment)An action that increments the value of the object.[`static let pick: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/pick)An action that selects the object, such as a menu item.[`static let press: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/press)An action that simulates clicking an object, such as a button.[`static let raise: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/raise)An action that simulates bringing a window forward by clicking on its title bar.[`static let showAlternateUI: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/showalternateui)An action that shows an alternate UI, for example, during a mouse-hover event.[`static let showDefaultUI: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/showdefaultui)An action that shows the original or default UI; for example, during a mouse-hover event.[`static let showMenu: NSAccessibility.Action`](/documentation/appkit/nsaccessibility-swift.struct/action/showmenu)An action that simulates showing a menu by clicking on it.
